item.title: Reforma Mega Resources v2.7.8.152 ATS
item.description:
Reforma Mega Resources v2.7.8.152 ATS

Changelog v2.7.8.152
General update to ATS 1.52
This is a major dependency pack for several map mods out there.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Reforma Other Maps Patch v24.152 ATS
item.description:
Reforma Other Maps Patch v24.152 ATS

This patch helps compatibility update with Reforma to other popular third-party map mods such as Coast to Coast, ProMods, ATS Expansion, CanaDream.
Place this mod above all other map mods at load order (top priority).
This mod includes a background map that fits with Reforma, matching SCS new UI background map from 1.50

General update to ATS 1.52



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Reforma Sierra Nevada Remake v1.3.152 ATS
item.description:
Reforma Sierra Nevada Remake v1.3.152 ATS

The Sierra Nevada map mod expands the game world to include the stunning Sierra Nevada region in California, USA.
Players can explore the scenic highways that wind through the towering peaks, verdant forests, and sparkling lakes of the Sierra Nevada mountain range.
The mod includes detailed recreations of real-world locations such as Lake Tahoe, Yosemite National Park, and the city of Reno, Nevada.
With challenging terrain and breathtaking scenery, the Sierra Nevada map mod offers a unique and immersive trucking experience for players.

Initial release of phase one Reforma Sierra Nevada Remake after California rework of 1.50.
This remakes the following routes;

– US 50 east of Sacramento to South Lake Tahoe
– CA 108 Sonora Pass, Sonora California.
– CA 120 Tioga Pass
– CA 41 to Fresno California.
– Yosemite National Park, Yosemite Valley, Tunnel View

The remaining areas keeps the old Sierra Nevada from 2019, more areas will be revamped eventually.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Realistic Light Effect V2.4.9.3 1.52 ETS2
item.description:
Realistic Light Effect V2.4.9.3 1.52 ETS2

This modification makes the truck lights more realistic and brighter.

Changelog V2.4.9.3:
– Added compatibility for game version 1.52.x

Patch compatibility: 1.52.x; Older versions;
Connection order: This mod should be above any graphic mod!
Mod compatibility: This mod work with all SCS default trucks!

Visual changes:
– Realistic light behaviour
– Realistic sign reflection effects
– Realistic LED effect
– Realistic Xenon effect
– Realistic Halogen effect
– Realistic low beam
– Realistic high beam



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Revamped Dynamic Suspension V2.2.7 ATS
item.description:
Revamped Dynamic Suspension V2.2.7 ATS

This update brings some tweaks to the feeling of the truck stability. Lateral leaning simulation of the driver has been reduced and you no longer should have the feeling of the overturn in curves.

Changelog V2.2.5: Physics: – Increased cabin sway bar factor – Reduced cabin COG – Reduced driver leaning compensation to the centrifugal acceleration – Reduced pitch backward Others: – Added compatibility for 1.48.x game version – Reworked description of the mod by accessing the Info Button in Mod Manager window – Added “Recommended settings” in percent values. Universal for any kind of user. (Keyboard/ Mouse/ Steering Wheel/ Joysticks and so on)

Patch compatibility: 1.52.x; Older versions;
Connection order: This mod should be set at high priority / above other physics mod!
Mod compatibility: This mod should work with all default trucks and the modded ones!

Modded Trucks compatibility:
– International 9800i by Harven
– International HX520 by Harven
– Freightliner Argosy by Harven
– Kenworth W990 edited by Harven
– Mack R Series by Harven
– Kenworth T680 – The General by Harven
– Freightliner FLB edited by Harven
– Modified Peterbilt 379/389 by Viper2

Recommended settings:
– Steering sensitivity 0.75
– Braking intensity 100%
– Truck stability 50%
– Trailer stability 50%
– Driveshaft torque 0% – 100% #Optional (use percentage as you like)
– [orange]Suspension stiffness 0%
– Cabin suspension stiffness 0%
– Uneven surface simulation 70% #Optional (use percentage as you like)
– Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) – ON
– Traction Control – ON

Note: If recommended settings aren’t proper for yourself, feel free to adjust them.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
